code: import React from'react';import{certifications}from'./certificationData';import Buttons from'../buttons/button';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Certifications=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"certificates",className:"relative top-24 text-blue-950 font-mono flex flex-col justify-center items-center mt-10 border-b-[2px] border-b-slate-200",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-4xl font-extrabold flex justify-center mb-4",children:"CERTIFICATIONS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap px-4 gap-x-12 pt-10 justify-center items-center w-full text-blue-950",children:certifications.map(certificate=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white project-card w-80 min-h-80 xs:mt-8 rounded-lg sm:mt-8 mt-4 p-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:" relative w-full flex h-[70%]",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"relative w-[100%] rounded-lg h-[100%] project-image",src:certificate.image})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative left-2 mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-lg italic font-normal project-title",children:certificate.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-xs italic text-gray-500 mt-2",children:certificate.platform})]})]}))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Buttons,{style:"project-btn w-40 text-center h-12 bottom-7 rounded-3xl bg-blue-950 py-3 font-bold hover:bg-blue-900 text-md",text:"View all"})]});};export default Certifications;
